useCase.name: Researcher Collaborates with Faculty
useCase.description: Researcher accesses faculty profiles, selects members, and saves for collaboration.

preconditions.precondition: Researcher is logged in to the system.

successEndConditions.condition: Researcher has successfully selected faculty members for collaboration.

mainSequence.step: UI initiates a search for faculty profiles.
Search queries faculty data in Profiles.
Researcher reviews faculty interests and expertise.
UI requests detailed information from Profiles.
Profiles provide detailed information to UI.
UI saves/notes selected faculty for collaboration.
Collab confirms the selection and provides next steps to Researcher.
